string-array.name: fullchangelog
string-array.item: @array/v105

string-array.name: v105
string-array.item: hyaku go
IMPORTANT: If you haven\'t rebooted yet, REBOOT IN 2 MINUTES AFTER APPLYING/UPDATING!

ATTENTION!!: This is a monthly build now, as I started school and I have much more responsibilities now, I can\'t juggle both CMTE, Layers and ROM source verification as well as assignments. From now on, I will accept requests, and only push out updates when deemed enough of an update. Please respect my decision and I would be grateful if you joined my G+ community instead of spamming my mailbox to post bugs, as other users can help answer your issue.
Revert back to previous fonts to prevent switching problems, AGAIN! No more complaints, please!
Add themed QS volume panel tile.
Add QS On-the-Go QS Tiles and Power Menu buttons.
Add themed notification drawer button to switch from Task Manager.
Replace contextual headers with new poly effect backgrounds by @BellaxMiu
Revamp ES File Explorer drawer text, thanks to @franzyroy.
Fix Chrome Dev\'s Unreadable bookmarks.
Pushbullet: Fix unreadable text colors for popup and search box.
Do not use publicized styles, call privatized ones instead.
Fix G+ Poll colors and reorganize cdt colors.
Fix unreadable text in Smart Lock "Places" activity and change header text in Google Settings.
Add inverted Google+ Overlay.
Add darkened button bar for Twitter.
Update Bluetooth connected status bar icon.
Fix OK Google Voice Training Text Colors.
Update YouTube Overlay for 10.35.53.
Add colorful Google icons into search bar and SystemUI\'s nav target.
Theme Snapdragon Browser (Cyanogen OS 12.1 edition).
Theme GalleryNext (Cyanogen OS 12.1 edition).
Theme DialerNext (Cyanogen OS 12.1 edition).
Add colored drawables for legacy Google Search apps.
Fix invisible Cyanogen Theme Chooser App Themer text color.
Bliss: Add exposed text color on DPI alert dialog.
Fix unreadable status change window in Hangouts.
WhatsApp: Change accent to green, and darken card colors.
Bliss: Add new QS Panel and QS Bar tiles.
Add themed KatPro notification text color.
Add themed Shuttle and Shuttle+ notification colors.
Fix invisible Root and SD card icon in history of ESFileExplorer.
Fix Google Play Music Tutorial Buttons.
Whiten YouTube search clear all button.
Fix YouTube text after typing in searchbox/actionbar.
Fix unreadable Frequently Contacted contact text colors.
Adjust Chrome tab text color and remove text shadows.
Re-add default text color to fix unreadable popups in Chrome.
Revert "Fix Chrome Bookmarks Invisible Text".
Add new WhatsApp Compose Icons by @arjerine.
Remove legacy Google Logo from Google Search Bar.
Hangouts Blocked People drawable - inverted the question marks.
Fix Google Play Services v8 - Popup menu black on black.
Drop support for Hangouts 3.0.
Change Hangouts overlay to use green instead of grey.
Add new Dropbox authenticator icon.
Fix BetterBatteryStats status bar color.
Fix Google Play Games Settings status bar.
Fix unreadable Google Play Games progress circle.
